summary: This is an FBI Guardian Complaint form summarizing a call from a victim to the FBI Los Angeles field office on August 20, 2020. The victim reported being a victim of Jeffrey Epstein in 1998 and offered information on Ghislaine Maxwell, requesting flight records from St. Thomas to Newark from that year to assist her case and seek victim assistance.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the perpetrator of child sex trafficking against the victim in 1998.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The victim offered to provide information about Maxwell in connection with the Epstein case.

connections.description: The victim's offer to provide information on Maxwell in the context of reporting Epstein's abuse implies their association in the alleged criminal activity.
The victim, who was abused by Epstein, specifically offered information on Maxwell, suggesting Maxwell's alleged involvement in the victimization.

events.title: Alleged Abuse of Victim
events.description: The victim reported being a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Victim Contact with FBI LA
events.description: A victim called the FBI Los Angeles field office to report her victimization by Jeffrey Epstein in 1998, offer information on Ghislaine Maxwell, and request flight records.

keyFacts: A victim contacted the FBI in August 2020 to report being a victim of Jeffrey Epstein in 1998.
The victim offered to provide information about Ghislaine Maxwell's involvement.
The victim specifically requested 1998 flight records from St. Thomas to Newark to support her case and seek victim assistance.
The document is an FBI Guardian Complaint form created in October 2021, summarizing the 2020 victim report.
